data.name: Jump Off The Bridge Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is a collection of music and other goodies from the game: Jump Off The Bridge!

Music Included:

  • The JOTB Soundtrack
    Music from the game!
  • Underneath The Ceiling Fan
    My singer/songwriter album!
  • Time Wizard Music and Sounds
    All the vocals, grunts, and noises from THE TIME WIZARD!

    Extras!

  • Game Map
    Shows the location of all the levels in the game (including secret levels), and upcoming levels!
  • A Short History of JOTB
    A letter that summarizes the origins of JOTB, its purpose, and a thank you

    COMING SOON TO THIS PACKAGE!

  • Easter Eggs Guide
    An in depth look at all the secrets in the game!
  • Strategy Guide
    A PDF including strategies for overcoming difficult levels!

data.short_description: This collection has Techno Dance Music, to Amateur Singer/Songwriter! It includes music from Jump Off The Bridge, music from my album, music and sounds from the Time Wizard, a updated game map, an Easter Eggs guide, and a strategy guide!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 800 MB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Jump Off The Bridge Soundtrack

content_descriptors.notes: Pixel Blood, Self-Harm (Of jumping off a bridge repeatedly)
